What's with the scene4all hate club down voting? Could somebody explain this to me? Because honestly, down votes should only be given if the upload is being represented as something it isn't. Like, if it's bad quality, a fake, badly cropped, out of sync, a cam when it says SCR, etc. Down votes because you don't like someone's uploads are misleading and unnecessary.

@chenzhen - I agree with you, just like they do with every other non-american movie. Take for example the girl with the dragon tattoo...you want to know why they re-made the original Swedish movie? Because Americans apparently can't read subtitles, and everything has to be in English for them to enjoy! And please don't come here and say ''..b-b-but muh high budget movies!'' if you compare the girl with the dragon tattoo with the Swedish movie män som hatar kvinnor, you'll realize it's essentially the same movie with nothing extra added, the only difference is the language.

@sorasbestfriend - definitely agree with how lazy SOME Americans are..can't say the same about myself. I remember looking for versions of the original girl with the dragon tattoo and seeing all kinds of copies that were dubbed english instead of having english subs. Really infuriated me. I love foreign movies, and dubbing really takes so much away from the films. However I did like the American version too because I also thought Rooney Mara was awesome.
Finally, a movie with a solid story and has meaning. Really makes you think. Torrent is 10/10. You dont need the best quality in the world to understand an imaginative movie like this.

being a pork pie fancier, i came here and got this. now i don't mind seeding , but i thought i had better warn would be grabbers that there are no pork pies in this film, which i found rather a disappointment. so i paused it ten minutes into my second viewing, went out and got some before continuing. thoroughly good film, better though if they had included some shots of pies at least, or even the word pork pie. just saying

i was surprised that there were no pork pies in this film. i was looking forward to learning about the life of them as i am interested in history. this should have been made clear as i was dissapointed. so beware. i just went to the local and bought a few to eat while i watched anyway, but that is not the point. so for this reason i am glad i did not pay for this. they did not even mention pies which was glaring error on their part, but i cannot see any reference to this on imdb either, so mistakes all round
